sentences.sContent: The avid comic book reader considers himself a borderline agoraphobic with mild-to-severe anxiety issues who wishes he were a superhero himself.
sentences.sContent_eng: The avid comic book reader considers himself a borderline agoraphobic with mild-to-severe anxiety issues who wishes he were a superhero himself.
sentences.sCn: 他同时是一个超级漫画迷，并认为自己有边缘恐旷症，和时轻时重的焦虑问题，他想成为一个超级英雄。

words.tran: 旷野恐怖；[心理] 广场恐怖症；陌生环境恐怖症
